comments.text: Interesting article on underwater welding – directly relevant to building and maintaining undersea habitats, a key aspect of my long-term underwater city goal.  The advancements in welding consumables and techniques highlighted here are crucial for the structural integrity of any subsea structure, especially in the harsh volcanic environments I'm interested in exploring.
